      • processTransaction

        public boolean processTransaction(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,TxOut> uTxOuts)
        Processes a transaction to see if it is valid.
        Parameters:
        uTxOuts - Current list of unspent transactions.
        Returns:
        true if transaction goes through successfully and unspent transactions are updated.

      • getSignature

        public void getSignature(java.security.PrivateKey privateKey)
        Generates a signature and sets it as the transaction's signature.
        Parameters:
        privateKey - Private Key of the wallet to generate signature.

      • verifySignature

        public boolean verifySignature()
        Verifies the transaction signature.
        Returns:
        true if signature if verified. false if unverified or exception occurs.
